DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator whether the presence of deficient immunologic mechanism resulting from an immunodeficiency disorder or other disease as a medical and/or social characteristic prevents a subject from being allowed to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the deficient immunologic mechanism resulting from an immunodeficiency disorder or other disease as a medical and/or social characteristic that prevents a subject from being allowed to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredDefinition: A human or animal whose immunologic mechanism is deficient because of an immunodeficiency disorder or other disease or as the result of the administration of immunosuppressive drugs or radiation.:Exclusion; the act of restricting entrance or barring from participation.

Concepts.definition: A loss of any arm of immune functions, resulting in potential or actual increase in infections. This state may be reached secondary to specific genetic lesions, syndromes with unidentified or polygenic causes, acquired deficits from other disease states, or as result of therapy for other diseases or conditions.
Medical and/or social characteristics that prevent a subject from being allowed to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: Immunocompromised patients (o
ReferenceDocuments.description: Immunocompromised patients (other than that related to the use of corticosteroids) including patients known to be HIV positive with an AIDS-defining illness.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Immunocompromised patients and patients known to be HIV positive and currently receiving antiretroviral therapy.  NOTE: Patients known to be HIV positive, but without clinical evidence of an immunocompromised state, are eligible for this trial.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Immunocompromised patients (other than that related to the use of corticosteroids) including patients known to be HIV positive with CD4<100 cells/uL

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Immunocompromised patients (other than that related to the use of corticosteroids) including patients known to be HIV positive

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Immunocompromised patients (other than that related to the use of corticosteroids) including patients known to be HIV positive with a CD4 count of <400

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Immunocompromised patients (other than that related to the use of corticosteroids)

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 6
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the patient known to be HIV positive with one or more of the following: baseline CD4 count of < 250 cells/mm3, history of AIDS indicator conditions, or anti-retroviral therapy with any potent CYP3A4 inhibitor

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG_CRF_TEXT_1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the patient immunocompromised (other than that related to the primary oncologic diagnosis or to the use of corticosteroids) including known to be HIV positive

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 7
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have CD4+ counts > 350 with no detectable viral load on quantitative PCR?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 8
ReferenceDocuments.description: Within 4 weeks prior to randomization, has the patient had CD4 count above 250 cells/mcL?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_eCRF_Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the patient immunocompromised as the result of HIV or immunosuppressive therapies or with active infections requiring intravenous antibiotics?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_eCRF_Text_2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have active infection(s) requiring intravenous antibiotics?

DataElement.origin: NCCTG CRF:North Central Cancer Treatment Group Case Report Form
DataElement.changeDescription: Replaced VD Eligibility Ind-2 2018257v1 with VD ID#3506068 - Yes No Indicator - dbw
